title: Proton transfer mediator for boosting the current density of biomass electrooxidation to the ampere level
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1603-1611
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04543A, Paper
Zhaohui Yang, Shao Wang, Chenyang Wei, Lan Chen, Zhimin Xue, Tiancheng Mu
Phosphate can be employed as a hydrogen transfer mediator to accelerate the PCET process of HMF dehydrogenation, and Ru, as a high valence metal, can reduce the band gap and improve the charge transfer efficiency.
